b: when told pen-draw then trail start with 30s thick-start thick-end, become untweened 2
when starts then trail end

when told h-all-off then tell h-t-off, tell h-i-off, tell h-m-off, tell h-p-off

when any state told by body grox-h-pen then become 3
when starts then tell h-all-on
when any state told by body grox-h-tp then become 4
when starts then tell h-all-off
starts then tell h-t-offc, tell h-i-off, tell h-m-offc, tell h-p-offc
when told handclose then tell pen-draw
when starts then tell h-all-off
when touches face then send one nearby to grox-tp-marker
when told handclose then tell tp-ack
when told handclose then become 2 in 0.2
when any state told h-i-off then become untweened 3
when any state told h-i-offc then become untweened 4

when told handclose then become 2 in 0.2
when any state told h-t-off then become untweened 3
when any state told h-t-offc then become untweened 4
when told handopen then become 1 in 0.2
when told h-t-on then become untweened 1
when told h-t-on then become untweened 1
when touches hand then tell h-selector-on, become 2 in 0.5s
when touches hand then tell h-selector-off, become 1 in 0.5s
when told h-selector-on then become untweened 2
when any state told h-selector-off then become untweened 1
when touches hand then tell h-i-off, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-i-offc, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-i-on, become untweened 2
when told h-selector-on then become untweened 2
when any state told h-selector-off then become untweened 1
when touches hand then tell h-m-off, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-m-offc, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-m-on, become untweened 2
when told h-selector-on then become untweened 2
when any state told h-selector-off then become untweened 1
when touches hand then tell h-p-off, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-p-offc, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-p-on, become untweened 2
when told h-selector-on then become untweened 2, tell h-all-on
when any state told h-selector-off then become untweened 1
when touches hand then tell h-t-off, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-t-offc, become untweened next
when touches hand then tell h-t-on, become untweened 2
when starts then is person.g_handrgrab = 0

when told by body hand trigger let go right then is person.g_handrgrab = 0, tell handopen
when starts then become untweened next

when told handcheck then tell handclose

when told tp-ack then become untweened next
